cause.description:
Boomers need to be legalized so that everyone can start talking into each other's heads. Right now only the Jews have this power and people who eat mushrooms...jks. The jews don't have to speak into each other's heads because no one listens to them anyways....jks jks
Lower the Boom to the people, let them hear life the way it was meant to be heard.
1. munch munch munch
2. force feed mushrooms to politicians
3. try not to find any retards in the closet
cause.mission: to munch our way to Capitol Hill
cause.name: Legalize Mushrooms
